name: State legislatures
tagline: Summary data about state legislative bodies
body:
## State Legislatures

This repository contains summary data about state legislative bodies, beginning with [partisan composition](http://www.ncsl.org/research/about-state-legislatures/partisan-composition.aspx) and [women in state legislatures](http://www.ncsl.org/legislators-staff/legislators/womens-legislative-network/women-in-state-legislatures-for-2013.aspx) as compiled by the National Conference of State Legislatures covering 2009-2013.

This site contains CSV and JSON files, which can be accessed as an API. A listing follows.

#### Party Control

* [Sept. 2013 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2013/control/ncsl_09112013.json)
* [Sept. 2013 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2013/control/ncsl_09112013.csv)
* [Jan. 2013 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2013/control/ncsl_01212013.json)
* [Jan. 2013 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2013/control/ncsl_01212013.csv)
* [Jan. 2012 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2012/control/ncsl_01102012.json)
* [Jan. 2012 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2012/control/ncsl_01102012.csv)
* [Jan. 2011 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2011/control/ncsl_01312011.json)
* [Jan. 2011 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2011/control/ncsl_01312011.csv)
* [Jan. 2010 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2010/control/ncsl_01102010.json)
* [Jan. 2010 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2010/control/ncsl_01102010.csv)
* [Jan. 2009 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2009/control/ncsl_01262009.json)
* [Jan. 2009 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2009/control/ncsl_01262009.csv)

#### Women

* [Oct. 2013 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2013/women/ncsl_10152013.json)
* [Oct. 2013 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2013/women/ncsl_10152013.csv)
* [Sept. 2012 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2012/women/ncsl_09172012.json)
* [Sept. 2012 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2012/women/ncsl_09172012.csv)
* [Nov. 2011 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2011/women/ncsl_11212011.json)
* [Nov. 2011 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2011/women/ncsl_11212011.csv)
* [Aug. 2010 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2010/women/ncsl_08182010.json)
* [Aug. 2010 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2010/women/ncsl_08182010.csv)
* [July 2009 JSON](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2009/women/ncsl_07302009.json)
* [July 2009 CSV](http://dwillis.github.io/state_legislatures/2009/women/ncsl_07302009.csv)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
